verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: rallied] [ARG1: his grassroots supporters] [ARGM-LOC: in a conference call] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [C-ARG1: designed to celebrate his 500 days in office] but it turned into a bashing session on Hillary Clinton and John McCain .
